config.sql: SELECT NID,B.SNAME AS SK, FACT_BALANCE AS BALANCE, FACT_A AS ONEYEAR, FACT_B AS TWOYEAR, FACT_C AS THREEYEAR, FACT_D AS FOURYEAR, C.SNAME AS SKXZ,(CASE WHEN ISINSIDE='1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS SFNB,(CASE WHEN ISNORMAL='1' THEN '是' ELSE '否' END) AS SFZC,D.SNAME AS FZCFL,E.SNAME AS ZWRZK, FACT_E AS KHSJE, FACT_F AS DNKHSJE, FACT_G AS YQZK, FACT_H AS SZXSSJE FROM (SELECT NID,DIM_CUSUPPLIER,DIM_COMPANY,DIM_ITEM,FACT_BALANCE,FACT_A,FACT_B,FACT_C,FACT_D,ISNATURE, ISINSIDE,ISNORMAL,SCONTENTA,SCONTENTB,FACT_E,FACT_F,FACT_G,FACT_H FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS WHERE DIM_COMPANY=:company AND DIM_PERIOD=:period AND DIM_ITEM='1003') A INNER JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMCUSTOMER WHERE SCOMCODE='1001') B ON A.DIM_CUSUPPLIER=B.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='10') C ON A.ISNATURE=C.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='11') D ON A.SCONTENTA=D.SCODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT SCODE,SNAME FROM DW_DIMDROPMENU WHERE SPCODE='12') E ON A.SCONTENTB=E.SCODE

columns.text: 已形成实质性损失金额

config.sql: WITH NOWYEAR AS( SELECT DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE,ISNORMAL,FACT_BALANCE,SCONTENTA, FACT_A,FACT_B,FACT_C,FACT_D,FACT_E,FACT_F,FACT_G,FACT_H FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS WHERE DIM_PERIOD='201812' AND DIM_COMPANY IN (SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE SPCODE LIKE '10010101%' AND CISDEL = 'N' AND CISLEAF = '1') AND DIM_ITEM='1003' AND ISINSIDE IS NOT NULL), LASTYEAR AS ( SELECT DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE,ISNORMAL,FACT_BALANCE, FACT_A,FACT_B,FACT_C,FACT_D FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS WHERE DIM_PERIOD='201712' AND DIM_COMPANY IN (SELECT SCODE FROM DW_DIMCOMPANY WHERE SPCODE LIKE '10010101%' AND CISDEL = 'N' AND CISLEAF = '1') AND DIM_ITEM='1003' AND ISINSIDE IS NOT NULL), AQBL AS ( SELECT FACT_A A FROM ( SELECT FACT_A,DIM_PERIOD FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS_FILL WHERE DIM_COMPANY = '10010101' AND SRATIOTYPE = '1' AND DIM_PERIOD <= '201812' ORDER BY DIM_PERIOD DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ), YJBL AS( SELECT FACT_A A FROM ( SELECT FACT_A,DIM_PERIOD FROM DW_FACTAGEANALYSIS_FILL WHERE DIM_COMPANY = '10010101' AND SRATIOTYPE = '2' AND DIM_PERIOD <= '201812' ORDER BY DIM_PERIOD DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ) /*1*/ SELECT case when Q.ISINSIDE='0' or Q.ISINSIDE='0_合计' then Q.DIM_COMPANY else '' end scode , case when Q.ISINSIDE='0' or Q.ISINSIDE='0_合计' then Q.DIM_COMPANY else Q.DIM_COMPANY || Q.ISINSIDE end gsbm , case when Q.ISINSIDE='0' then Q.GSMC when Q.ISINSIDE='0_合计' then '总计' else '' end gsmc , case when Q.ISINSIDE='0'or Q.ISINSIDE='0_合计' then '外部' when Q.ISINSIDE='1' or Q.ISINSIDE='1_合计' then '内部' when Q.ISINSIDE<>'0' and Q.ISINSIDE<>'1' and Q.ISINSIDE<>'0_合计' and Q.ISINSIDE<>'1_合计' then '合计' else Q.ISINSIDE end KJ, case when Q.ISINSIDE='0' or Q.ISINSIDE='0_合计' then null else Q.DIM_COMPANY end as pid,Q.YE,Q.ZJE,Q.ZJL,Q.RISKRANGE,W.ZCJE,E.FFF1,E.FFF2,E.FFF3,E.FFF4,E.FFF5,E.FFF6,E.FFF7, R.WWW1,R.WWW2,R.WWW3,R.WWW4 FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN GROUPING(A.DIM_COMPANY)=1 THEN '9' ELSE A.DIM_COMPANY END) AS DIM_COMPANY,C.SNAME AS GSMC, (CASE WHEN GROUPING(A.ISINSIDE)=1 AND GROUPING(A.DIM_COMPANY)=0 THEN A.DIM_COMPANY||'_小计' WHEN GROUPING_ID(A.DIM_COMPANY,A.ISINSIDE)=3 THEN '999_合计' WHEN GROUPING(A.ISINSIDE)=0 AND GROUPING(A.DIM_COMPANY)=1 THEN A.ISINSIDE||'_合计' ELSE A.ISINSIDE END) AS ISINSIDE, NVL(SUM(A.FACT_BALANCE),0) AS YE, (NVL(SUM(A.FACT_BALANCE),0)-NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0)) AS ZJE, (CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((NVL(SUM(A.FACT_BALANCE),0)-NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0))/NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0),2) END) AS ZJL, (CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(SUM(A.FACT_BALANCE),0)-NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0))/NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0) END) <= NVL((SELECT A FROM AQBL),0 ) THEN 'SAFE' WHEN (CASE WHEN NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0)=0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(SUM(A.FACT_BALANCE),0)-NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0))/NVL(SUM(B.FACT_BALANCE),0) END)>=NVL((SELECT A FROM YJBL),0) THEN 'DANGER' ELSE 'PROMPT' END ) AS RISKRANGE, (NVL(SUM(A.FACT_A),0)) AS FACT_A,(NVL(SUM(A.FACT_B),0)) AS FACT_B,(NVL(SUM(A.FACT_C),0)) AS FACT_C,(NVL(SUM(A.FACT_D),0)) AS FACT_D FROM NOWYEAR A LEFT JOIN LASTYEAR B ON A.DIM_COMPANY=B.DIM_COMPANY AND A.ISINSIDE=B.ISINSIDE INNER JOIN DW_DIMCOMPANY C ON A.DIM_COMPANY=C.SCODE GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((A.DIM_COMPANY,C.SNAME,A.ISINSIDE),(A.DIM_COMPANY,C.SNAME),A.ISINSIDE,NULL)) Q LEFT JOIN (SELECT (CASE WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=1 THEN '9' ELSE DIM_COMPANY END) AS DIM_COMPANY, (CASE WHEN GROUPING_ID(DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE)=3 THEN '999_合计' WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=0 AND GROUPING(ISINSIDE)=1 THEN DIM_COMPANY||'_小计' ELSE ISINSIDE END) AS ISINSIDE, SUM(NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0)) AS ZCJE FROM NOWYEAR WHERE ISNORMAL='1' AND ISINSIDE='0' GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE),DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE,NULL)) W ON Q.DIM_COMPANY=W.DIM_COMPANY AND Q.ISINSIDE=W.ISINSIDE LEFT JOIN (SELECT (CASE WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=1 THEN '9' ELSE DIM_COMPANY END) AS DIM_COMPANY, (CASE WHEN GROUPING_ID(DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE)=3 THEN '999_合计' WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=0 AND GROUPING(ISINSIDE)=1 THEN DIM_COMPANY||'_小计' ELSE ISINSIDE END) AS ISINSIDE, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1101' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF1, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1102' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF2, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1103' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF3, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1104' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF4, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1105' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF5, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1106' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF6, SUM((CASE WHEN SCONTENTA='1107' THEN NVL(FACT_BALANCE,0) ELSE 0 END)) AS FFF7 FROM NOWYEAR WHERE ISNORMAL='0' AND ISINSIDE='0' GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ( (DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE),DIM_COMPANY,NULL)) E ON Q.DIM_COMPANY=E.DIM_COMPANY AND Q.ISINSIDE=E.ISINSIDE LEFT JOIN (SELECT (CASE WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=1 THEN '9' ELSE DIM_COMPANY END) AS DIM_COMPANY, (CASE WHEN GROUPING_ID(DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE)=3 THEN '999_合计' WHEN GROUPING(DIM_COMPANY)=0 AND GROUPING(ISINSIDE)=1 THEN DIM_COMPANY||'_小计' ELSE ISINSIDE END) AS ISINSIDE, SUM(NVL(FACT_E,0)) AS WWW1, SUM(NVL(FACT_F,0)) AS WWW2,SUM(NVL(FACT_G,0)) AS WWW3,SUM(NVL(FACT_H,0)) AS WWW4 FROM NOWYEAR WHERE ISINSIDE='0' GROUP BY GROUPING SETS ((DIM_COMPANY,ISINSIDE),DIM_COMPANY,NULL)) R ON Q.DIM_COMPANY=R.DIM_COMPANY AND Q.ISINSIDE=R.ISINSIDE ORDER BY Q.DIM_COMPANY,Q.ISINSIDE

columns.text: 通过融资性贸易、赊销业务、虚假贸易等虚增应收
为其他企业代偿金融机构的贷款
已形成实质性损失金额
